project.name: |-- 006-method-references
project.description:
Keywords: + Lambdas, lambda expressions + Method References
This project includes simple examples that illustrates the use of method references.
MethodReferenceKindsRunner: Illustrate with a stupid example how to create method references for lambdas of expressions of the three kinds (static methods, instance methods applied to the arguments, and instance methods applies to particular instances).
SortingMethodReferenceRunner: Illustrates how to use use a method reference when sorting a list.
ConstructorMethodReferencesRunner: Illustrates how to use method references with constructors.
